data.title: Murderpedia, the encyclopedia of murderers
data.meta_description: Awilda Lopez is an American woman sentenced to 15 years to life in prison in New York for the murder of her daughter, 6-year-old Elisa Izquierdo on November 22, 1995.
data.text:
Murderpedia has thousands of hours of work behind it. To keep creating new content, we kindly appreciate any donation you can give to help the Murderpedia project stay alive. We have many

plans and enthusiasm to keep expanding and making Murderpedia a better site, but we really

need your help for this. Thank you very much in advance.
